_header: All of a story I will you read
Subjects: Celestin, saint, life of; saints’ lives

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
Al of a storie I wile ȝou redehou euery man aughte synne
                    dredeIf þat he thenke wel to spedeffor godes
                    myght…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þat non of vs ne falle þer ynBe nyght ne
                    dayAnd bring vs lord to þi blisseþat lasteþ
                    ay
BodLauMis463.Note:
Set forth with fourth line to right of preceding three and with fifth
                    and sixth written as one with punctuation between.
BodLauMis463.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Legenden von Celestin und Susanna.” 
             Anglia
         1 (1878): 55-101, 390-1: 67-85.
